column1: E se todas as portas estivessem abertas? Estamos à procura de um gestor administrativo experiente para supervisionar as operações diárias de apoio da nossa empresa. Queremos que as pessoas desfrutem da viagem! A missão é assegurar que todas as atividades de apoio sejam efetuadas de forma eficiente e eficaz para permitir que as outras operações funcionem corretamente.
Fornecer uma visão empresarial de valor que ajude os decisores a gerir mais eficazmente os seus negócios para um maior retorno.

7 hours ago ;"Em 2025 seremos uma comunidade com 1.000 empresas sendo mentoradas por nós faturando juntos 1 bilhão de reais por ano.

A Codirect é um núcleo de capacitação digital para negócios locais. Nós ajudamos os donos de negócios locais a conquistarem uma Marca de Valor por meio do digital. Trabalhamos com um programa de Mentoria chamado Marca de Valor. Já atendemos mais de 1.200 empresas e ganhamos prêmios pelos resultados.
Estamos com um plano ousado... vamos crescer 10x nos próximos 5 anos
column2: e você pode fazer parte desse crescimento. Estamos com a vaga de Customer Success
column3: cuja missão é fazer com que os clientes tenham resultado com o programa
column4: ajudando eles a desenvolver novos hábitos
column5: novas habilidades e ajudar a superar seus desafios que o impedem de construir uma Marca de Valor (MDV) no seu negócio.

column1: O CS é um das principais responsáveis por manter um relacionamento próximo com os clientes para que eles tomem as atitudes necessárias para que eles tenham resultado. É uma das tarefas mais importantes da empresa pois é o que vai fazer com que o cliente tenha resultado fazendo o seu investimento valer a pena.
O Customer Success é responsável por estimular
column3: auxiliar o cliente a realizar sonhos
column6: desenvolver competências novas e tirar bloqueios que impedem o Mentorado de alcançar o sucesso na aplicação do Método.

column1: A Agnus Investimentos é uma assessoria premiada que conta com um time de Assessores altamente qualificado.

Nossa experiência e capacidade técnica diferenciadas nos tornou reconhecidos no mercado de Assessoria de Investimentos pelo compromisso em atendimento com excelência e alto padrão aos nossos clientes.
Estamos em ritmo de crescimento e
column3: queremos convidá-lo (a) a se unir e escrever com a gente mais um capítulo da nossa história.

column1: Está disposto a crescer com a gente e é obstinado?
Então esta oportunidade é para você!

✔️ Comunicação com gerentes para identificar necessidades de treinamento;
✔️ Elaborar planos de desenvolvimento para equipes e indivíduos;
✔️ Coordenar e acompanhar os KPIs de eficiência dos treinamentos.

column2: além de um plano de cargos e carreiras estruturado para que você sempre possa crescer e se desenvolver.

column1: The Aspen Network of Development Entrepreneurs (ANDE) is a global network of organizations that propel entrepreneurship in developing economies. ANDE members provide critical financial
column3: and business support services to small and growing businesses (SGBs) based on the conviction that SGBs create jobs
column5: and produce environmental and social benefits.

column1: As the leading global voice of the SGB sector
column2: ANDE believes that SGBs are a powerful
column3: yet underleveraged tool in addressing social and environmental challenges. Since 2009
column4: ANDE has grown into a trusted network of nearly 300 collaborative members
column5: representing a wide range of entrepreneurship support organizations
column9: and others relevant to the Small and Growing Business sector that operate in nearly every developing economy. ANDE grows the body of knowledge
column11: and connects the institutions that support the small business entrepreneurs who build inclusive prosperity in developing economies.

column1: ANDE is recruiting a senior leader in the small business entrepreneurship
column2: impact investing and sustainable development sector in Brazil to be the Regional Chapter Head to lead and grow the influence of the SGB sector within the region. In particular
column3: work will focus on strengthening the entrepreneur ecosystem in Brazil.

column1: The Brazil Regional Chapter Head is the heart of the organization and must successfully function at many different levels. It is one of the most challenging roles in the organization and one of the most rewarding for its direct impact on strengthening entrepreneurial ecosystems and helping members deliver a range of strong development benefits to the region
The Brazil Regional Chapter Head leads all aspects of ANDE’s regional strategic branding
column3: and operations in the region. This position oversees the management of ANDE’s programs across Brazil
column7: and membership. It includes ensuring the efficient
column9: and high-quality design and implementation of programs
column10: compliance with all donor and local legal requirements as well as ANDE and the Aspen Institute’s policies and regulations.

column1: Membership: Strengthen engagement with existing members
column2: while also recruiting new members to the network. Establishing and facilitating connections and collaboration among ANDE members in the region.

column1: Development : In collaboration with senior leadership
column2: contributing to and executing a business strategy aligned with ANDE’s global and regional strategies
column3: maintaining and building strong relationships with a wide range of donors
column4: and developing and delivering upon a robust pipeline of new programmatic and resource development opportunities.

column1: Program : Coaching and supervising program teams for the successful delivery of results; ensuring timely submission of high-quality internal and donor reports supporting national – adaptation and use of program management tools and working with program staff to identify and address technical assistance needs.
Representation : Establishing and maintaining strong relationships with key stakeholders
column6: and developing relevant partnerships; representing ANDE to a wide array of audiences; providing thought leadership to the small and growing business sector within the region.

column1: Compliance : Representing ANDE in legal matters within the region and ensuring ANDE retains and consults with qualified local legal counsel as needed; ensuring that ANDE is appropriately registered and complies with regulations.

column3: and approving expenditures to ensure compliance with regional and donor financial requirements

column1: Governance: The West Africa Steering Committee provides strategic advice to the regional chapter. In collaboration with the Managing Director
column2: lead the West Africa Steering Committee by recruiting
column4: and engaging with members drawn from the ANDE Network.

column1: Communications and advocacy: Overseeing and contributing to regional communications and advocacy strategies and campaigns
column2: including engaging with senior-level decision-makers in government and among other key stakeholders.

column1: The ideal candidate for this role has the following attributes:
Bachelor’s degree with a minimum of 10 years of relevant experience
column2: or a Master’s degree with a minimum of eight years of relevant experience with a preference of at least five years of management experience.

column1: Proven ability to fundraise and work with donor organizations and professionally manage and represent an organization.
Five years’ management experience relating to the development and implementation of large-scale projects with responsibility for all aspects of operations
Experience working in small business entrepreneurship
Be able to represent ANDE in the region to a wide range of stakeholders
column2: including senior-level government officials and donors.

column1: Familiarity with climate and gender action in the region
Experience working with USAID and other bilateral funding is strongly preferred
column2: with prior budget development and management experience required.

column1: Ability and willingness to travel up to 20% domestically and internationally.
Excellent communicator with prior public speaking experience preferred.
Fluency in written and spoken English and Portuguese. Capabilities in Spanish preferred.
Externally this position is being recruited as the Brazil Regional Chapter Head.
This position will be hired for and be an employee of a local partner in Brazil and is open to local candidates only.
The role will be based in Brazil and is only open to candidates who have work authorization in Brazil.
The Aspen Institute is an Equal Opportunity Employer and complies with all District and federal laws. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race

“Você sonha grande e deseja uma carreira na qual você possa exercer impacto real sobre o negócio?
Na KraftHeinz você pode! E também é protagonista da sua carreira. Segundo a Época Negócios- estamos entre as 10 melhores empresas de Desenvolvimento de Carreira!
Nós trabalhamos para tornar a vida das pessoas deliciosas com muita dedicação e paixão. Acreditamos que isso só é possível através de um time cada vez mais diverso e plural.
A Kraft Heinz tem com um dos seus pilares a diversidade! Acreditamos que as diversas origens e perspectivas nos tornam mais fortes- mais interessantes e mais inovadores.

Para reforçar nosso compromisso com a diversidade e fazer o melhor todos os dias- nossas vagas priorizam pessoas pretas e pardas- mulheres e pessoas com deficiência. Investimos em nossas pessoas e queremos que sejam elas aqui dentro.

E além disso- para firmar nosso comprometimento com a sociedade somos parceiros do MOVER- acreditamos que podemos ser agentes transformadores por um futuro com oportunidades igualitárias à todas as pessoas.
Eles são nossas crenças e princípios mais íntimos e nos inspiram a sermos excelentes.
Nós ousamos fazer melhor todos os dias
Nós motivamos a excelência em todo nosso time
Deu match com o nosso DNA? Então vem tornar a vida das pessoas mais deliciosas com a gente! Veja essa oportunidade que temos para você.”
Responsible for Brazilian Overview analysis once data is received and updated within the models- a brief is made to review the main changes vs last cycle.
Lead Demand monthly analysis and pre meetings and support sign off meeting with Business.
Support long term demand planning process (Strategic Plan)
Provide insights of any depletions trend variance- comparison with historical behaviour- to agree a new forecast with the commercial team.
Assemble and analyse all data pertinent to supporting the S&OP / Forecast- through models maintenance (historical sales- trends- open orders- seasonality- promotions- and Distributor inventory).
Deliver continuously improve forecasting techniques- method- and approach to make a step change on forecast accuracy - focused on the main SKU in the business.
Support Activity Management on the innovation process to deliver new launches- challenge when appropriate.
Provide visibility of KPIs BIAS- Accuracy- Orders delayed and be a support in action plans to improve them.
Support the cross functional team of Sales- Marketing- Operations and Finance to achieve consensus each month within the S&OP cycle.
Ensure the Forecast Submission aligned w/ organizational Planning and Business cycle (KHBM)
Support IBP project implementation being part of the core team as functional expert
Provide statistical Sales Forecast as baseline and improve its accuracy
Stay tunned w/ all demand drivers and align all demand building blocks that are part of the sales forecast figures.
Lead Demand monthly analysis and pre meetings and support sign off meeting with Business
Deliver continuously improve forecasting techniques- method- and approach to make a step change on forecast accuracy - focused on the main SKU in the business
Support IBP implementation as functional expert
Provide visibility of KPIs BIAS- Accuracy- Orders delayed and be a support in action plans to improve them
Ensure the Forecast Submission aligned w/ organizational Planning and Business cycle (KHBM)
Provide statistical Sales Forecast as baseline and improve its accuracy.
Bachelor’s degree in Engineering- Administration- Business- Logistics or equivalent.
Experience in Demand planning- Forecasting- Commercial Planning
Good knowledge of MS Office and SAP (Excel advance is required)
Power BI or similar knowledge is desired
Experience in FMCG (Wanted- but not mandatory)
Experience w/ S&OP or IBP processes.
The Kraft Heinz Company is one of the largest food and beverage companies in the world
